problem.markdown:
>>If each of the counting numbers from 1 through 10 is multiplied by 13, how many of the resulting numbers will be even?<< = 5
[explanation] The amount of resulting even numbers will be the same as the amount started with.
problem.p: If each of the counting numbers from 1 through 10 is multiplied by 13, how many of the resulting numbers will be even?

formulaequationinput.label: If each of the counting numbers from 1 through 10 is multiplied by 13, how many of the resulting numbers will be even?

problem.p: The amount of resulting even numbers will be the same as the amount started with.
